full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,HA CANG RKAN PO DKAR PO'I BSANG MCHOD TSA GDUNG SEL BA'I GA BUR CHU RGYUN ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES HA CAN RKAN PO DKAR PO'I BSANG MCHOD TSA GDUNG SEL BA'I GA BUR CHU RGYUN ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SNYIGS DUS KYI 'GRO RNAMS BSOD NAMS DMAN ZHING PHYUGS LA DGRA JAG CHOM RKUN YAMS NAD SOGS DAR TE GOD KHA'I NYEN CHE BYUNG BA LA PHAN SNYAM BSAM PAS DGE SLONG GZUGS 'DZIN PAS AARTHA SIDDHA MING CAN GYIS, ,RANG GI LHAG BSAM GYIS BSKUL TE SUG BRIS SU SBYAR BAS DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
